title: Redo Log Status / Tekrar Günlüğü Durumu
description: Displays redo log groups and their operational status

queries.sql: SELECT lg.group#, COUNT(*) file_count, MIN(lf.bytes) / (1024*1024) size_mb, lg.status FROM v$log lg JOIN v$logfile lf ON lg.group# = lf.group# GROUP BY lg.group#, lg.status ORDER BY lg.group#

doc_hint: Displays redo log groups and status. ACTIVE/INACTIVE/UNUSED are normal; other statuses warrant investigation.
analysis_prompt: Analyze redo log configuration. Report: (1) log group count and sizes, (2) any unusual status values, (3) log switch frequency (if possible).
